profile.verificationHeading: When your account is verified, a blue check mark will appear on your ads. Verifying your membership increases your sales and others' trust in your account. The verification data is confidential and is not shared or disclosed to any other party.
profile.verifyWithApp: Verify National ID or Residency (for individuals) through the app
profile.commercialVerification: Verify Commercial Registration (for companies, establishments, and freelancers) through the Ministry of Commerce
profile.falVerification: Add Fal License for Brokerage and Marketing

balance.availableBalanceTooltip: Available Balance = Total Balance - Pending Balance
balance.walletTooltip: Wallet: Contains amounts in your account
balance.feesCondition: I acknowledge that the intermediary or local bank may deduct additional fees **
balance.responsibilityCondition: I alone bear any loss resulting from incorrect or inaccurate information
balance.durationCondition: I acknowledge that bank transfers may take up to 7 working days to arrive
balance.conditionNote1: Bank transfers you send are international, and depending on your bank, the transfer may go through an intermediary bank to complete the transfer, which will result in additional fees being deducted.
balance.conditionNote2: The local bank you use may charge additional fees for receiving international wire transfers or fees for converting currency from dollars to local currency.

safety1: Meet the seller in a public place like the metro, malls, or gas stations
safety2: Take someone with you when going to meet the seller or buyer
safety3: Inspect the product carefully before buying and ensure the price is appropriate
safety4: Do not pay or transfer money until you have thoroughly inspected the product
